Summary: BRIGHT OBJECT SPOTTED OVER SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
divs: Sighting DetailsON SUNDAY AUGUST 1ST WE WERE OUTSIDE HAVING A BIRTHDAY PARTY FOR MY 3 YEAR OLDNEPHEW, WHEN SUDDENLY A BRIGHT GLARE IN THE SKY CAUGHT MY ATTENTION. I TOLDEVERYONE AROUND ME TO LOOK UP IN THE SKY. THE BRIGHT LIGHT MOVED at a slow rateof speed.SUDDENLY IT TOOK OFF LITTLE BY LITTLE GETTING DIMMER AS IT MOVED ITMOVED IN A ZIG ZAG MOTION.THE OBJECT . WE LOST SIGHT BECUASE OF THE MOTION ANDRATE OF SPEED.
